SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces
Interface IAdContext

public interface IAdContext

IAdContext is the main facade for ad requesting, should be created in each Activity that wants to display Ads.

Method Summary

          Register an event listener.

Method Detail

getConstants

IConstants getConstants()
Get constants look up table.

Returns:
an IConstants object

registerVideoDisplay

@Deprecated
void registerVideoDisplay(android.view.SurfaceView videoDisplay)
Deprecated. 

Set the video display.
Deprecated. Use registerVideoDisplayBase(FrameLayout)registerVideoDisplayBase instead.
Important Note: please put the SurfaceView in a FrameLayout, only FrameLayout container is supported currently.

Parameters:
videoDisplay - the SurfaceView which resides in a FrameLayout

registerVideoDisplayBase

void registerVideoDisplayBase(android.widget.FrameLayout videoDisplayBase)
Set the FrameLayout on which the temporal ads will be drawn.
AdManager will use it to find where to play the temporal ads. Video ads will fill the FrameLayout and overlay ads will be put at a certain position of the FrameLayout.

Parameters:
videoDisplayBase - the FrameLayout on which the temporal ads will be drawn

resetExclusivity

void resetExclusivity()
Reset the exclusivity scope.

startSubsession

void startSubsession(int subsessionToken)
Start a new subsession with subsession token. Following requests will be in the subsession, until this method is called again with a different token. It will turn on FW_CAPABILITY_SYNC_MULTI_REQUESTS capability.

Parameters:
subsessionToken - a positive int value to identify the subsession

setActivity

void setActivity(android.app.Activity activity)
Set the Activity object which create this adContext.
An Ad Context should be attached to an Activity.

Parameters:
activity - the Activity this IAdContext is attached to

getActivity

android.app.Activity getActivity()
Return application's current Activity which create and hold the reference of this AdContext.

Returns:
the Activity object

setActivityState

void setActivityState(int state)
Should be invoked when the Activity's state change.

setVideoState

void setVideoState(int videoState)
Set the video play state.

Parameters:
videoState - the type of the state, the value should be one of:

VIDEO_STATE_PLAYING
VIDEO_STATE_PAUSED
VIDEO_STATE_STOPPED
VIDEO_STATE_COMPLETED

setParameter

void setParameter(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.Object value,
                  int level)
Set the parameters for a special level.

Parameters:
name - key of the parameter to be set
value - value for the key
level - level of the parameters, must be one of:

PARAMETER_LEVEL_GLOBAL
PARAMETER_LEVEL_OVERRIDE

setProfile

void setProfile(java.lang.String playerProfile,
                java.lang.String defaultTemporalSlotProfile,
                java.lang.String defaultVideoPlayerSlotProfile,
                java.lang.String defaultSiteSectionSlotProfile)
Set the profiles which describes the player and slots.

Parameters:
playerProfile - name of the global profile
defaultTemporalSlotProfile - name of the temporal slot default profile, null for default
defaultVideoPlayerSlotProfile - name of the video player slot default profile, null for default
defaultSiteSectionSlotProfile - name of the site section slot default profile, null for default

setVisitor

void setVisitor(java.lang.String customId,
                java.lang.String ipV4Address,
                int bandwidth,
                java.lang.String bandwidthSource)
Set the attributes of the visitor.

Parameters:
customId - custom id of the visitor
ipV4Address - ip address of the visitor
bandwidth - bandwidth of the visitor
bandwidthSource - bandwidth source of the visitor

setVisitorHttpHeader

void setVisitorHttpHeader(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String value)
Set the HTTP headers of the visitor.

Parameters:
name - name of the header to be set
value - value of the header to be set, null to remove

setCapability

void setCapability(java.lang.String capability,
                   int status)
Set the capabilities supported by the player.

Parameters:
capability - name of the capability, should be one of:

CAPABILITY_SLOT_TEMPLATE, ON by default
CAPABILITY_ADUNIT_IN_MULTIPLE_SLOTS, ON by default
CAPABILITY_SLOT_CALLBACK, ON by default
CAPABILITY_BYPASS_COMMERCIAL_RATIO_RESTRICTION
CAPABILITY_SYNC_MULTI_REQUESTS
CAPABILITY_RESET_EXCLUSIVITY
CAPABILITY_RECORD_VIDEO_VIEW
status - the status be set, should be one of:

CAPABILITY_STATUS_ON
CAPABILITY_STATUS_OFF
CAPABILITY_STATUS_DEFAULT
Note:
Changing renderer capability after renderer starts playing may result undefined behaviour.

setSiteSection

void setSiteSection(java.lang.String siteSectionId,
                    int pageViewRandom,
                    int networkId,
                    int idType,
                    int fallbackId)
Set the attributes of the site section.

Parameters:
siteSectionId - id of the site section
pageViewRandom - unique id for current playing
networkId - id of the network the site section belongs to, 0 for default
idType - type of the id above, should be one of

ID_TYPE_CUSTOM
ID_TYPE_FW
ID_TYPE_FWGROUP
fallbackId - site section id to fallback, if id specified by the 1st parameter is not found, 0 for default

setVideoPlayer

void setVideoPlayer(int videoPlayerNetworkId)
Set the attributes of the video player.

Parameters:
videoPlayerNetworkId - id of the network the player belongs to

setVideoAsset

void setVideoAsset(java.lang.String videoAssetId,
                   double duration,
                   java.lang.String location,
                   boolean autoPlay,
                   int videoPlayRandom,
                   int networkId,
                   int idType,
                   int fallbackId)
Set the attributes of current video asset to play.

Parameters:
videoAssetId - id of the video
duration - duration of the video in seconds
location - location of the video, null for default
autoPlay - whether the video begins to play automatically without user interaction
videoPlayRandom - random number that is generated each time a user watches this video asset
networkId - id of the network the video belongs to, 0 for default
idType - type of video id above, should be one of:

ID_TYPE_CUSTOM
ID_TYPE_FW
ID_TYPE_FWGROUP
fallbackId - video id to fallback, if id specified by the 1st parameter is not found, 0 for default

setVideoAsset

void setVideoAsset(java.lang.String videoAssetId,
                   double duration,
                   java.lang.String location,
                   int autoPlayType,
                   int videoPlayRandom,
                   int networkId,
                   int idType,
                   int fallbackId,
                   int durationType)
Set the attributes of current video asset to play.

Parameters:
videoAssetId - id of the video
duration - duration of the video in seconds
location - location of the video, null for default
autoPlayType - auto play mode, includes:
  • VIDEO_ASSET_AUTO_PLAY_TYPE_NONE
  • VIDEO_ASSET_AUTO_PLAY_TYPE_ATTENDED
  • VIDEO_ASSET_AUTO_PLAY_TYPE_UNATTENDED

videoPlayRandom - random number that is generated each time a user watches this video asset.
networkId - id of the network the video belongs to, 0 for default
idType - type of video id above, includes:
  • ID_TYPE_CUSTOM
  • ID_TYPE_FW
  • ID_TYPE_FWGROUP

fallbackId - video id to fallback, if id specified by the 1st parameter is not found, 0 for default
durationType - type of duration of asset, includes
  • VIDEO_ASSET_DURATION_TYPE_EXACT
  • VIDEO_ASSET_DURATION_TYPE_VARIABLE

setVideoAssetCurrentTimePosition

void setVideoAssetCurrentTimePosition(double timePosition)
Set time position of video asset. If the stream is broken into multiple distinct files, this should be the time position within the asset as a whole.

Parameters:
timePosition - a non-negative number in seconds indicate the time position of video asset

setRequestMode

void setRequestMode(int requestMode)
Set the mode of request. AdManager runs in On-Demand mode by default. To switch to live mode by invocation of this method right after getting a new AdContext instance.

Parameters:
requestMode - the type of request mode

REQUEST_MODE_ON_DEMAND
REQUEST_MODE_LIVE

setRequestDuration

void setRequestDuration(double requestDuration)
Set duration of request in live mode.

Parameters:
requestDuration - the value of duration in seconds

addKeyValue

void addKeyValue(java.lang.String key,
                 java.lang.String value)
Add the key-value pair, if add different values with the same key, they will both the values for the key.

Parameters:
key - key name of the key-value pair to be set, null or empty string will no effect
value - value to be set, null has no effect

addTemporalSlot

void addTemporalSlot(java.lang.String customId,
                     java.lang.String adUnit,
                     double timePosition,
                     java.lang.String slotProfile,
                     int cuePointSequence,
                     double maxDuration,
                     java.lang.String acceptPrimaryContentType,
                     java.lang.String acceptContentType,
                     double minDuration)
Add a temporal slot.

Parameters:
customId - custom id of the slot, add a slot with an identical name as existing slot will be ignored
adUnit - ad unit supported by the slot
timePosition - time position of the slot
slotProfile - profile name of the slot, null for default
cuePointSequence - sequence of the cuePoint of the slot
maxDuration - maximum duration of the slot allowed, 0 for default
acceptPrimaryContentType - accepted primary content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
acceptContentType - accepted content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
minDuration - minimum duration of the slot allowed, 0 for default

addVideoPlayerNonTemporalSlot

void addVideoPlayerNonTemporalSlot(java.lang.String customId,
                                   java.lang.String adUnit,
                                   int width,
                                   int height,
                                   java.lang.String slotProfile,
                                   boolean acceptCompanion,
                                   java.lang.String acceptPrimaryContentType,
                                   java.lang.String acceptContentType)
Add a video player non-temporal slot.

Parameters:
customId - custom id of the slot, add a slot with an identical name as existing slot will be ignored
adUnit - ad unit supported by the slot
width - width of the slot in device-independent pixels
height - height of the slot in device-independent pixels
slotProfile - profile name of the slot, null for default
acceptCompanion - whether to accept companion ads on this slots
acceptPrimaryContentType - accepted primary content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
acceptContentType - accepted content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default

addVideoPlayerNonTemporalSlot

void addVideoPlayerNonTemporalSlot(java.lang.String customId,
                                   java.lang.String adUnit,
                                   int width,
                                   int height,
                                   java.lang.String slotProfile,
                                   boolean acceptCompanion,
                                   java.lang.String acceptPrimaryContentType,
                                   java.lang.String acceptContentType,
                                   int initialAdOption,
                                   java.lang.String compatibleDimensions)
Add a video player non-temporal slot.

Parameters:
customId - custom id of the slot, add a slot with an identical name as existing slot will be ignored
adUnit - ad unit supported by the slot
width - width of the slot in device-independent pixels
height - height of the slot in device-independent pixels
slotProfile - profile name of the slot, null for default
acceptCompanion - whether to accept companion ads on this slots
acceptPrimaryContentType - accepted primary content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
acceptContentType - accepted content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
initialAdOption - choice of the initial ad of this slot, should be one of

SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_STAND_ALONE
SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_KEEP_ORIGINAL
SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_ONLY
SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_STAND_ALONE
SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_THEN_STAND_ALONE
SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_NO_STAND_ALONE
SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_NO_STAND_ALONE
SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_NO_STAND_ALONE_IF_TEMPORAL
SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_NO_STAND_ALONE_IF_TEMPORAL
compatibleDimensions - compatible dimensions in form of "width,height|width,height", such as ""320,240|480,720"

addSiteSectionNonTemporalSlot

void addSiteSectionNonTemporalSlot(java.lang.String customId,
                                   java.lang.String adUnit,
                                   int width,
                                   int height,
                                   java.lang.String slotProfile,
                                   boolean acceptCompanion,
                                   java.lang.String acceptPrimaryContentType,
                                   java.lang.String acceptContentType,
                                   int initialAdOption,
                                   java.lang.String compatibleDimensions)
Add a site section non-temporal slot.

Parameters:
customId - custom id of the slot, adding a slot with an identical name as existing slot will be ignored
adUnit - ad unit supported by the slot
width - width of the slot in device-independent pixels
height - height of the slot in device-independent pixels
slotProfile - profile name of the slot, null for default
acceptCompanion - whether to accept companion ads on this slots
acceptPrimaryContentType - accepted primary content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
acceptContentType - accepted content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
initialAdOption - choice of the initial ad of this slot, should be one of

SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_STAND_ALONE
SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_KEEP_ORIGINAL
SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_ONLY
SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_STAND_ALONE
SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_THEN_STAND_ALONE
SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_NO_STAND_ALONE
SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_NO_STAND_ALONE
SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_NO_STAND_ALONE_IF_TEMPORAL
SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_NO_STAND_ALONE_IF_TEMPORAL
compatibleDimensions - compatible dimensions in form of "width,height|width,height", such as ""320,240|480,720"

addSiteSectionNonTemporalSlot

void addSiteSectionNonTemporalSlot(java.lang.String customId,
                                   java.lang.String adUnit,
                                   int width,
                                   int height,
                                   java.lang.String slotProfile,
                                   boolean acceptCompanion,
                                   java.lang.String acceptPrimaryContentType,
                                   java.lang.String acceptContentType)

Parameters:
customId - custom id of the slot, adding a slot with an identical name as existing slot will be ignored
adUnit - ad unit supported by the slot
width - width of the slot in device-independent pixels
height - height of the slot in device-independent pixels
slotProfile - profile name of the slot, null for default
acceptCompanion - whether to accept companion ads on this slots
acceptPrimaryContentType - accepted primary content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
acceptContentType - accepted content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default

getSlotByCustomId

ISlot getSlotByCustomId(java.lang.String customId)
Get a slots by its customId.

Parameters:
customId - custom id of the slot
Returns:
an ISlot object, or null if not found

getSlotsByTimePositionClass

java.util.ArrayList<ISlot> getSlotsByTimePositionClass(int timePositionClass)
Get all slots by its timePositionClass.

Parameters:
timePositionClass - the value should be one of:

TIME_POSITION_CLASS_PREROLL
TIME_POSITION_CLASS_MIDROLL
TIME_POSITION_CLASS_POSTROLL
TIME_POSITION_CLASS_OVERLAY
TIME_POSITION_CLASS_DISPLAY
TIME_POSITION_CLASS_PAUSE_MIDROLL
Returns:
an Array of ISlot object, will return an empty array if none found

getTemporalSlots

java.util.ArrayList<ISlot> getTemporalSlots()
Get all the temporal slots.

Returns:
an Array of ISlot object, will return an empty array if none found

Returns:
an Array of ISlot object, will return an empty array if none found

java.util.ArrayList<ISlot> getSiteSectionNonTemporalSlots()

Returns:
an Array of ISlot object, will return an empty array if none found

submitRequest

void submitRequest(double timeoutSeconds)
Submit the request to FreeWheel Ad Server. Each AdContext can only submitRequest once.

Parameters:
timeoutSeconds - timeout time in seconds for this request

                 java.lang.String adUnit,
                 java.lang.String contentType,
                 java.lang.String slotType,
                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)

addEventListener

void addEventListener(java.lang.String type,
                      IEventListener listener)
Register an event listener.

Parameters:
type - name of the event to listen to
listener - the listener

removeEventListener

void removeEventListener(java.lang.String type,
                         IEventListener listener)
Remove an event listener.

Parameters:
type - the name of the event to listen to
listener - the listener

dispatchEvent

void dispatchEvent(IEvent event)

dispose

void dispose()
Dispose this AdContext object and remove all event listeners of it, stop all playing slots.
After this call, all other methods should not be invoked in this adContext.

getVideoLocation

java.lang.String getVideoLocation()
Get video asset's url location.

Returns:
a String set by API setVideoAsset's location parameter, or null if not set

getParameter

java.lang.Object getParameter(java.lang.String name)
Retrieve a parameter.

Parameters:
name - name of the parameter need to retrieve

getAdManager

IAdManager getAdManager()
Get the AdManager object which create the current AdContext.

Returns:
an IAdManager object

getRequestMode

int getRequestMode()
Get the mode of ad request.

Returns:
A int value set by API setRequestMode , possible value is:
REQUEST_MODE_ON_DEMAND
REQUEST_MODE_LIVE
default value is REQUEST_MODE_ON_DEMAND

notifyUserAction

void notifyUserAction(int userAction)
Set the user actions.

Parameters:
userAction - The value should be one of:
USER_ACTION_PAUSE_BUTTON_CLICKED
USER_ACTION_RESUME_BUTTON_CLICKED

loadExtension

void loadExtension(java.lang.String name)
Load player extension from given URL which implements IExtension.
Event IConstants.EVENT_EXTENSION_LOADED will be fired when an extension succeeds or fails to initialize.

Parameters:
name - a String identifier of the extension
